column5: Honestly, yeah, it would be a huge fucking disappointment

Thank you a lot, ill try and apply this to my life. I really appreciate that you took your time to write all of this. Im thinking itd be a nice thing to try and express myself more freely, often i find it difficult because im scared of rejection ( p common thing i think)

I have a friend with a very similar experience, she is now better and is in a safe relationship with another girl. I really hope you get better. I dont know if its a thing where you are but i know at some moment she attended group therapy.
